title: [Large-Scale] Disaster Management Leadership: Case-Based Learning for Strengthening Cultural Competence

context.prior_knowledge: Mastery of Basic Disaster Management Theory and Practical Experience
context.additional_context: Administrator-targeted course aiming to improve cultural bias awareness in smartphone-based learning environments, evaluating disaster scenario application skills through project-based assessments

learning_goals: Learners analyze conflict cases with stakeholders from diverse cultural backgrounds and identify at least three types of biases.
Learners develop two or more decision-making frameworks that consider cultural differences in disaster response processes.
Learners achieve over 80% participation in case study discussions and earn a collaboration score of 4.0/5.0 or higher in peer evaluations.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
